item.title: Tenant is blocking pathway, highways England outside his property at 03 Daintry way E9 5JJ. The tenant is also storing a wheelie bin and shopping trolley outside the garden gate causing obstruction. The tenant also uses the shopping trolley to fly tip large amount of household waste around the Trowbridge estate on a regular basis. Someone could please address this anti-social behavior being caused by this individual., 16th August

item.title: Long nails sticking out of border of play area covered by bark, 16th August
item.description:
